select * from ( SELECT pay.id,pay.flag,pay.datetime,pay.fee, patient.id as pid,patient.`name`, doctor.id as drid,doctor.realname, user.id as uid , user.name as uname, prescription.id as prescriptionId FROM pay,doctor,user,patient,prescription WHERE pay.patient_id=patient.id AND pay.doctor_id=doctor.id AND prescription.id=pay.prescription_id GROUP BY pay.id ) list
AND to_days(list.datetime) = to_days(now())
AND list.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
limit #{index},#{count}
